img.alt: An analog clock showing the time 2:05. The shorter hour hand is pointing slightly past the 2, and the longer minute hand is pointing directly at the 1.

qti-content-body.p: Not quite. The shorter hour hand is just past the 2, so the hour is 2. The longer minute hand is pointing at the 1, which represents 5 minutes past the hour. Therefore, the time is 2:05.
